title: Business Operations Dashboards
text: Custom-built business management dashboards that centralize client management, financial tracking, team performance, inventory control, and reporting into one structured system.

detailPage.heroTitle: Custom Business Dashboards That Bring Structure to Growing Companies
detailPage.heroSubTitle: We design and build centralized business control systems that eliminate operational chaos and give founders real visibility over clients, revenue, teams, and performance.

overview.title: Stop Running Your Business on Spreadsheets and Scattered Tools
overview.subTitle: We transform disconnected operations into one intelligent, scalable system.
description: Many growing businesses manage clients in WhatsApp, track payments in spreadsheets, monitor inventory manually, and assign tasks through informal communication. This fragmented structure leads to lost data, delayed decisions, financial blind spots, and operational inefficiencies.

Solvorr Tech builds custom business dashboards that act as a centralized operational backbone. From client lifecycle management to revenue tracking, from inventory monitoring to internal task allocation — everything lives inside one secure and structured system.
These are not template dashboards. We architect systems around how your business actually operates, ensuring long-term scalability, data clarity, and leadership control.

subServices.title: Client & CRM Management Systems
subServices.description: Structured CRM dashboards to manage leads, active clients, communication logs, project history, contract records, and revenue tracking in one controlled environment.

subServices.title: Team & Task Management Systems
subServices.description: Role-based internal dashboards to assign responsibilities, track deadlines, measure productivity, and create accountability across departments.

subServices.title: Project & Operations Tracking
subServices.description: End-to-end visibility of project stages, deliverables, workflow progress, and operational bottlenecks.

subServices.title: Financial & Revenue Management
subServices.description: Integrated invoicing systems, payment tracking, cash flow monitoring, and revenue analytics for financial clarity.

subServices.title: Inventory & Performance Analytics
subServices.description: Live dashboards tracking stock levels, operational KPIs, and business intelligence insights.

serviceBenefits.title: Full Operational Visibility
serviceBenefits.description: Founders gain real-time clarity over revenue, clients, inventory, and internal workflows without relying on manual updates.

serviceBenefits.title: Reduced Operational Errors
serviceBenefits.description: Structured systems eliminate duplicate data entry and reduce dependency on human memory.

serviceBenefits.title: Centralized Data Control
serviceBenefits.description: All core business information is secured and accessible through role-based permissions.

serviceBenefits.title: Built for Growth
serviceBenefits.description: Your dashboard evolves as your team size, client base, and operational complexity increase.

serviceProccess.description: We design database structures, feature maps, and dashboard layouts.

serviceProccess.description: Secure backend and scalable frontend dashboard development.

serviceProccess.description: Ensuring accuracy, performance, and system stability.

serviceProccess.description: System launch, onboarding guidance, and continuous improvement.

starterOffer.title: Small Business Starter Dashboard
starterOffer.description: Best for small teams managing clients and payments manually.

title: Workflow & Business Automation
text: Strategic workflow automation systems that integrate your tools, eliminate repetitive tasks, and create seamless operational efficiency.

detailPage.heroTitle: Automate Repetitive Work and Reclaim Operational Efficiency
detailPage.heroSubTitle: We connect your dashboards, CRM, payment systems, website, and communication tools into intelligent automated workflows.

overview.title: Manual Processes Are Slowing Your Business Down
overview.subTitle: Automation creates speed, consistency, and scalable operations.
description: Businesses waste countless hours manually transferring data, sending reminders, updating spreadsheets, confirming orders, and following up with clients.

Solvorr Tech builds workflow automation systems that connect your entire tech stack — dashboards, e-commerce platforms, booking systems, WhatsApp, payment gateways, and APIs — into structured automation flows.
Our goal is simple: reduce human workload, eliminate process delays, and create reliable systems that operate 24/7 without supervision.

subServices.title: E-Commerce Automation
subServices.description: Order processing, status updates, CRM syncing, and automated customer communication.

subServices.title: Lead & Sales Automation
subServices.description: Automatic lead capture, routing, tagging, and follow-up sequences.

subServices.title: Booking & Reminder Systems
subServices.description: Appointment confirmations, reminder notifications, and scheduling workflows.

subServices.title: Data Sync & API Integrations
subServices.description: Secure data synchronization between internal systems and third-party tools.

subServices.title: Operational Alerts & Notifications
subServices.description: Real-time internal alerts to prevent bottlenecks and missed actions.

serviceBenefits.title: Increase Process Speed
serviceBenefits.description: Automated systems execute instantly and consistently.

serviceBenefits.title: Reduce Human Error

title: Business Websites & System Integration
text: Strategic business websites built as front-end systems that integrate directly with dashboards, automation workflows, and lead management.

detailPage.heroTitle: Websites That Connect Directly to Your Business Systems
detailPage.heroSubTitle: We build fast, structured websites that integrate with your dashboards and automation workflows — turning traffic into organized data.

overview.title: Your Website Should Feed Your System — Not Create More Chaos
overview.subTitle: We build websites that act as structured data entry points into your business ecosystem.
description: Most businesses treat websites as isolated marketing assets. But when websites are not connected to internal systems, leads get lost, data becomes fragmented, and operational follow-ups break down.

At Solvorr Tech, we build structured websites designed to integrate directly with your dashboards and automation systems. Every form submission, booking request, or inquiry automatically enters your CRM, triggers workflows, and updates your operational dashboard.
This creates a seamless flow from visitor to client — without manual intervention.

subServices.title: Structured Business Websites
subServices.description: Professional websites built with performance, scalability, and system integration in mind.
